Listen this game is torture for yourself, and this coming from a player with over 1500+ hours. Once you reach past the state of the game to where you know you've improved at a high degree and know you're a good player, you'll start to see how awfully designed this game is. First thing is that this is one of the most toxic games you'll ever play if you play for a reasonable amount of time. Doesn't matter whether you play killer or survivor, it's on both sides. In this game there are no winners, The only difference is whether or not the person playing killer is a degenerate who uses all of his perks to make the game as slow as possible. I think games are only supposed to last about 10-15 minutes, but when Reginald the Third has all of his perks dedicated to make the game last even longer it drains your soul ever so slowly to the point that you don't even wanna play anymore. Nobody has any honor at all, the game is toxic, don't purchase this game if you don't want to hate a game ever so slowly as i have. BHVR has no idea how to balance a game. Still awful and the animations are worse than ever. I suggest never playing this game for long, i dread every game i go into now. Both sides of the game are just not like they used to be. Killers used to require lots of skill to reach high ranks and apply good pressure towards survivors and be able to mind game situations to get downs. Now everyone dedicates their entire being to slowing the game down to last forever and playing like a jackass. Survivors to rank up doesn't require you to be good at the game anymore, it just hands it to you. I used to love playing as killer in early 2020 because high ranks you would see really good survivors and I loved playing against it, now you can't tell the difference between a rank 20 and a rank 1 because they all play the same. The player base has grown, but also just became worse in player skill as well. Toxicity is still high, doesn't matter the era in the game its just a toxic game. Just know I told you so when i say don't get addicted to this game because you'll hate yourself every step of the way. Good luck to you.

Все, кто покупал игру менее 14 дней назад, играли менее 2 часов: забирайте деньги. Это не игра, а 3,14здец, здесь баланса не существует в принципе, практически любой у*бан может взять барбекю и чили, зов медсестры или саму медсестру: могут так взорвать ваше днище, что вы будете писать на эту игру обзоры, так же, как и я. "Pretty good job so far" - так и сказал человек, который высрал эту игру. Ведь, конечно же, работа была проделана хорошо, ровно так же, как и Friday 13th на данный момент (то есть про баланс можно забыть). И вас, даже хороших игроков (какими бы вы не были), раз*бут за счёт того, что убийца будет: кэмпить, тунеллить, может быть просто напросто силён из-за того, что "родился в белой рубашке". Сочуствую всем тем, чей период рефанда упущен - ждите фиксов, которые кстати обычно настроены против вас, за кого бы вы не играли. Но вот система подбора здесь вишенка на торте из говна, её смысл: "Пофиг, пусть играет с кем хочет" - именно так я за убийцу 13 ранга запускался против всех 2 рангов... за*бись. Плюс ко всему, выберете вы убийцу или выжившего - вам удостоится честь сыграть с наилучшим комьюнити по сравнению с той же кс или дотой, вам не дадут покоя: и мать упомянут и смерти пожелают, короче сделают из вас чудовище, просто потому что. Оценка: 3/10 - зал*па Джорджа.

Oh the game that will you love and hate. It involves pay to win, yet myself never investing into it and buying it on sale, it is okay. Yes, I do not end up having some over-powered skills and might seem weaker than other players but it is fine for me. However, if you do not want to indulge into over-competitive, toxic, bugged yet addictive game this is not recommended. 

P.S. This has reminded me of Dota 2 with its emotional ups and downs, so some players may relate and perhaps avoid anything that might make them FLAME

Problems include a barrier to entry for new players, by that I mean theres a paywall to 90 percent of the games content, in terms of other killers besides the main 5, same goes for survivors. Now, can you get all content for free? yes. Is it worth sinking hundreds of hours of your time to get enough shards for 1 killer? I'll let you be the judge of that. The only other problem with the game is that it, by design, will never feel fair. Its 4 against one, but each of the 4 have next to no power against the killer. While this isn't bad, I feel it may turn away new players simply because they may feel as though they have little power as survivor, and at the same time feel overwhelmed as killer. 

As for the good stuff in this game, I think it is a celebration of horror as a genre, not just horror games, but horror in its entirety. Think of this game as the super smash bros. of horror. I think the gameplay is fun, but can get frustrating very quick, considering the balancing issue mentioned previously. I also like how the game doesn't require friends to play. If solo, play killer. If you have some friends, then play survivor. I also think the perk and add-on system add a very much needed level of depth to the gameplay, and if it didn't exist then I can't honestly say the game is as good as it is. 

In summary, play this game. But if you don't like it for some of the reasons listed above, have some patience. I can assure you it gets better the more you play

Extremamente arrependido de ter comprado este jogo.

I'm gonna have to say don't buy this game, the gameplay itself needs so much work and feels so clunky it isn't fun, this applies to both killer and survivors, it seems the devs only care about microtransactions, skins, and events. While the game itself seems neglected and boring.

Would Not Recommend At All !

1. You will need most or some DLC to at least stand a chance against others. SO buying just the base game is not enough.
2. The game is full of bugs. So many of them, everywhere. You will just get mad to the point where you want to destroy your computer.
3. LAG. Add lots of lag on most servers on top of Bugs. and you get Dead By Daylight
4. Community is full of toxic people who either abuse some broken in-game mechanics just to annoy you, or they are toxic in the post-game chat. Very rarely you get decent people.
5. The Devs seem more concerned of releasing new DLC for people to buy than fixing they server issues and bugs

 I played alot but now it's getting worse everyday so i decided to take a break or maybe even quit it. At first the game is fun, you enjoy it... but won't take long till you get mad most of the matches cause of the lag and bugs. Honestly, imagine coming home from work and feeling like you want to play a fun game and enjoy your evening. You get into a lobby and start a match and by the end of it you will be mad and want to punch the s**t out of your computer.

Seriously, save your money. There are more and far better games out there worth your time and money.

This game is terribly unbalanced, with each new update something else breaks, the killers complain that the survivors are overpowered and the survivors complain that the killers are overpowered, the community is toxic and unwelcome to new players. The game devs play the game but don't see the faults in their own design and refuse to fix bugs that consistently  arise. The matchmaking is inconsistent and long, which is odd since they have dedicated servers. That being said there are some good points to the game, it can be fun when you get into an evenly matched match.
